headline.print_headline: Release of U.S. Senate CIA 'Torture' Report Still on Hold
headline.main: Release of U.S. Senate CIA 'Torture' Report Still on Hold

lead_paragraph: The public release of a long-awaited U.S. Senate report detailing the CIA's use of harsh interrogation techniques could be held up for weeks as the Senate Intelligence Committee and Obama administration negotiate what material can be included in the document, the committee's chairwoman said on Monday.
